definition: abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)

sentences.english: In summer, Longqing Gorge is a summer resort in Beijing suburb.
sentences.chinese: 龙庆峡夏季是京郊避暑胜地。

sentences.english: Beijing suburb farmers' appealing to the higher authorities for help focus losing land problems.
sentences.chinese: 失地问题已成为京郊农民上访的主流。

sentences.english: The program still has been re-test in the suburbs of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 这个方案也同样在北京郊区的城乡接合部被再次实验。

sentences.english: And now, some farmers on the outskirts of Beijing are making the game a reality.
sentences.chinese: 而现在，北京郊区一些农民使该游戏成为现实。

sentences.english: Sinovac's headquarters is in an industrial park on the outskirts of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京科兴的总部设在北京郊区的一个工业园内。

sentences.english: Jackson Hole – Beijing Villas is a resort community near the Great Wall, outside of Beijing, China.
sentences.chinese: 原乡美利坚是北京郊区长城附近的一个度假村。

sentences.english: Coming back to Beijing I was welcome by the cold winter weather that I've become accustomed to on this production.
sentences.chinese: 然后马上又回到了北京郊区，在寒冷的冬天拍戏。

sentences.english: Goose and Duck Grange is a typical representative of touring agriculture in the suburban area of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 鹅和鸭农庄是京郊颇具特色的观光农业的代表。

definition: Fangshan district of Beijing, formerly Fangshan county
Changping district of Beijing, formerly Changping county
Miyun town and county in Beijing
Shunyi district of Beijing, formerly Shunyi county
Pinggu rural district of Beijing, formerly Pinggu county
Ji county in Tianjin 天津[Tian1 jin1]
Weichang Manchu and Mongol autonomous county in Chengde 承德[Cheng2 de2], Hebei
enclosure/pig pen/hunting ground exclusively kept for emperor or nobility (in former times)
Tongzhou district east of Beijing, formerly Tong county/Tongzhou county level city in Nantong 南通[Nan2 tong1], Jiangsu
